GSD.product_version: versions from v4.20 to before v5.4.197
GSD.description:
raid5: introduce MD_BROKEN

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.197 by commit 25f0e9459f94f67d3d8222ddd785e35485757735, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit fb73b357fb985cc652a72a41541d25915c7f9635. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.details:

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.197 by commit 25f0e9459f94f67d3d8222ddd785e35485757735, it was introduced in version v4.20 by commit fb73b357fb985cc652a72a41541d25915c7f9635. For more details please see the references link.
